#bronze_location = "abfss://bronze@" + StorageName + ".dfs.core.windows.net/historic_data/claim/year=*/*/"
bronze_location = "abfss://bronze@" + StorageName + ".dfs.core.windows.net/reference_data/30tb/*/Patient.ndjson"
silver_location = "abfss://silver@" + StorageName + ".dfs.core.windows.net/"
write_mode="overwrite"
###### Load Patient data to data frame

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import explode_outer

Patient_address_explode_df = Patient_df.select("id",explode(Patient_df.address)).toDF("id","address")

Patient_address_explode2_df = Patient_address_explode_df.select("id",explode_outer(Patient_address_explode_df.address.line),"address.city","address.country","address.postalCode","address.state","address.extension.url").toDF(*("Patient_id","address_line","address_city","address_country","address_postalCode","address_state","address_extension_url"))

Patient_address_explode3_df = Patient_address_explode2_df.select("Patient_id","address_line","address_city","address_country","address_postalCode","address_state",explode_outer(Patient_address_explode2_df.address_extension_url)).toDF(*("Patient_id","address_line","address_city","address_country","address_postalCode","address_state","address_extension_url"))

Patient_address_explode3_df.printSchema()

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import explode_outer

Patient_identifier_explode_df = Patient_df.select("id",explode(Patient_df.identifier)).toDF("id","identifier")

Patient_identifier_explode2_df = Patient_identifier_explode_df.select("id",explode_outer(Patient_identifier_explode_df.identifier.type.coding.code),"identifier").toDF("id","identifier_type_coding_code","identifier")

Patient_identifier_explode3_df = Patient_identifier_explode2_df.select("id","identifier_type_coding_code",explode_outer(Patient_identifier_explode2_df.identifier.type.coding.display),"identifier").toDF("id","identifier_type_coding_code","identifier_type_coding_display","identifier")


Patient_identifier_explode4_df = Patient_identifier_explode3_df.select("id","identifier.system","identifier_type_coding_code","identifier_type_coding_display",explode_outer(Patient_identifier_explode3_df.identifier.type.coding.system),"identifier.type.text","identifier.value").toDF("Patient_id","identifier_system","identifier_type_coding_code","identifier_type_coding_display","identifier_type_coding_system","identifier_type_text","identifier_value")


Patient_identifier_explode4_df.printSchema()
###### Patient extension - start here in the morning

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import explode_outer

Patient_extension_explode_df = Patient_df.select("id",explode(Patient_df.extension)).toDF("id","extension")

Patient_extension_df = Patient_extension_explode_df.select("id","extension.url","extension.valueAddress.city","extension.valueAddress.country","extension.valueAddress.state","extension.valueDecimal","extension.valueString").toDF("Patient_id","extension_url","extension_valueAddress_city","extension_valueAddress_country","extension_valueAddress_state","extension_valueDecimal","extension_valueString")

Patient_extension_df.printSchema()

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Observation_code_explode_df = Observation_df.select("id","code.text",explode(Observation_df.code.coding)).toDF(*("id","text","coding"))

Observation_code_df = Observation_code_explode_df.select("id","text","coding.*").toDF(*("id","code_text","coding_code","coding_display","coding_system"))  

Observation_code_df.write.mode(write_mode).parquet(silver_location+"Observation_code/")

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Claim_main_explode_df = Claim_df.select(
    "id","resourceType","status","billablePeriod.end","billablePeriod.start","created","patient.display","patient.reference",
    "prescription.reference","provider.display","provider.reference","total.currency","total.value","use")

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_main_df= Claim_main_explode_df.toDF(*( 
    "Claim_id","resourceType","status","billablePeriod_end","billablePeriod_start","created",
    "patient_display","patient_id_reference",
    "prescription_reference","provider_display","provider_org_id_reference","total_currency","total_value","use"))

Claim_main_df = Claim_main_df.withColumn("patient_id_reference",regexp_replace("patient_id_reference","Patient/","")).withColumn(
    "provider_org_id_reference",regexp_replace("provider_org_id_reference","Organization/",""))

Claim_main_df.write.mode(write_mode).parquet(silver_location+"Claim_main/")

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Claim_insurance_explode_df = Claim_df.select("id", explode(Claim_df.insurance))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_insurance_df= Claim_insurance_explode_df.toDF(*( "Claim_id","insurance"))

Claim_insurance_df = Claim_insurance_df.select("Claim_id","insurance.coverage.display","insurance.focal","insurance.sequence" ).toDF(*("Claim_id","insurance_coverage.display","insurance_focal","insurance_sequence" ))

Claim_insurance_df.write.mode(write_mode).parquet(silver_location+"Claim_insurance/")

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Claim_diagnosis_explode_df = Claim_df.select("id",  explode(Claim_df.diagnosis))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_diagnosis_df= Claim_diagnosis_explode_df.toDF(*( "id", "diagnosis"))

Claim_diagnosis_df = Claim_diagnosis_df.select("id","diagnosis.diagnosisReference.reference","diagnosis.sequence").toDF(*( "Claim_id","diagnosis_reference","diagnosis_sequence"))

Claim_diagnosis_df=Claim_diagnosis_df.withColumn("diagnosis_reference",regexp_replace("diagnosis_reference","Condition/",""))  

Claim_diagnosis_df.write.mode(write_mode).parquet(silver_location+"Claim_diagnosis/")

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Claim_procedure_explode_df = Claim_df.select("id",explode(Claim_df.procedure))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_procedure_df= Claim_procedure_explode_df.toDF(*( "id","procedure"))

Claim_procedure_df = Claim_procedure_df.select("id","procedure.procedureReference.reference","procedure.sequence").toDF(*("Claim_id","procedure_reference","procedure_sequence"))

Claim_procedure_df=Claim_procedure_df.withColumn("procedure_reference",regexp_replace("procedure_reference","Procedure/",""))

Claim_procedure_df.write.mode(write_mode).parquet(silver_location+"Claim_procedure/")

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Patient_address_explode_df = Patient_df.select("id",explode(Patient_df.address))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Patient_address_df= Patient_address_explode_df.toDF(*( "id","address"))

Patient_address_df = Patient_address_df.select("id"
,"address.city"
,"address.country"
,"address.line" 
,"address.postalCode"
,"address.state"
).toDF(*("Patient_id"    
,"address_city"
,"address_country"
,"address_line" 
,"address_postalCode"
,"address_state"))


#Patient_address_df = Patient_address_df.withColumn("procedure_reference",regexp_replace("procedure_reference","Procedure/",""))

# #,"address.line" 
# #,"address.postalCode"

display(Patient_address_df.limit(10))

# ,"address.city"
# ,"address.country"
# ,"address.line" 
# ,"address.postalCode"
# ,"address.state").toDF(*("Claim_id","procedure_reference","procedure_sequence"))

#Patient_address_df = Patient_address_df.withColumn("procedure_reference",regexp_replace("procedure_reference","Procedure/",""))

Patient_address_df.write.mode(write_mode).parquet(silver_location+"Patient_address/")

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Patient_identifier_explode_df = Patient_df.select("id",explode(Patient_df.identifier))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Patient_identifier_df= Patient_identifier_explode_df.toDF(*( "id","identifier"))

Patient_identifier_df = Patient_identifier_df.select("id"
,"identifier.system"  
,"identifier.type.coding.code"
,"identifier.type.coding.display"
,"identifier.type.coding.system" 
,"identifier.type.text"   
,"identifier.value"
).toDF(*("Patient_id"    
,"identifier_system"  
,"identifier_type_code"
,"identifier_type_code_display"
,"identifier_type_code_system" 
,"identifier_type_text"   
,"identifier_value"
))

display(Patient_identifier_df.limit(10))

Patient_identifier_df.write.mode(write_mode).parquet(silver_location+"Patient_identifier/")

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Patient_extension_explode_df = Patient_df.select("id",explode(Patient_df.extension))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Patient_extension_df= Patient_extension_explode_df.toDF(*( "id","extension"))

Patient_extension_df = Patient_extension_df.select("id"
,"extension.url"  
,"extension.valueAddress.city"
,"extension.valueAddress.country"
,"extension.valueAddress.state" 
,"extension.valueDecimal"   
,"extension.valueString"
).toDF(*("Patient_id"    
,"extension_url"  
,"extension_valueAddress_city"
,"extension_valueAddress_country"
,"extension_valueAddress_state" 
,"extension_valueDecimal"   
,"extension_valueString"
))

display(Patient_extension_df.limit(10))

Patient_extension_df.write.mode(write_mode).parquet(silver_location+"Patient_extension/")
